official_title: A bill providing for the establishment of a National Offshore Vessel Operators Safety Advisory Committee.
short_title: Offshore Safety Advisory Committee Act of 1988

summary.text: Offshore Safety Advisory Committee Act of 1988 - Establishes the National Offshore Vessel Operators Safety Advisory Committee to make recommendations to the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating regarding safety aspects of offshore oil, gas, and other mineral operations.

titles.title: Offshore Safety Advisory Committee Act of 1988
A bill providing for the establishment of a National Offshore Vessel Operators Safety Advisory Committee.
